items.sentence: How many years have Tom and Mary been married?
How much time are you going to stay in Boston?
Tom finished his beer and ordered another one.
Tom found the key that he\'d been looking for.
Quite a few books in my library are in French.
Everyone in Tom\'s family is really patriotic.
We probably won\'t need to ever do that again.
I can\'t focus on two things at the same time.
I hope Tom doesn\'t go to Australia with Mary.
I haven\'t yet talked to my lawyer about this.
I didn\'t think doing that would be that easy.
I know that you\'re hiding behind the curtain.
I\'m not going to pack your suitcases for you.
Tom is getting ready to move into a new house.
I let myself in with the key Tom had given me.
I lived in Boston for only about three months.
Tom doesn\'t have any idea what Mary is doing.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary is planning to do.
Tom doesn\'t love anyone and no one loves him.
Tom said that you said that you saw something.
